Inside Macintosh: Advanced Color Imaging on the Mac OS /
Preface - About This Book

A Note on ColorSync Versions

The advanced color imaging books use "ColorSync Manager" or "ColorSync" to refer to version 2.1. They use a specific version number, such as "ColorSync 1.0," only where necessary to identify features associated with a particular version. They most commonly use "2.x" to refer to the International Color Consortium profile reference format version used by ColorSync Manager version 2.0 and later. However, where appropriate, they may use "2.x" to refer inclusively to ColorSync versions 2.0 and 2.1.

For more information on profiles, see "Profiles" (page 3-20).
